::Weapon::

The boulder explodes into big chunks, and there's an explosion.  Weapon went
flying again, and he hit the ground hard again.  And a chunk of boulder came
smashing right on top of him.

"Weehee, I luvvit I luvvit I luvvit!!!!!!!!" Weapon yelled, getting back up.

He took his fusion cannon and fired a shot back at Cyndro.

"Take that clown face!" Weapon yelled, although it would be pretty hard to
hear for average hearing.
